2025.title: AI Action Summit in Paris
2025.description: Held on February 10–11, over 1,000 participants from 100+ countries—including Macron and Modi—gathered to set global AI investment (€200 B InvestAI), ethics, and regulation agendas.

2025.title: Stargate LLC $500 B US AI infra investment announced
2025.description: In Jan 2025, US government–backed Stargate LLC (OpenAI, SoftBank, Oracle, MGX) announced a $500 billion initiative—starting with $100 B—to build national-scale AI infrastructure by 2029.

2025.title: Nvidia unveils Blackwell Ultra & Vera Rubin chips at GTC
2025.description: At GTC Mar 2025, Nvidia revealed Blackwell Ultra (H2’25) and Vera Rubin (2026), plus robotics model Groot N1, Halos safety system, Isaac Groot for robotics, Cosmos synthetic-data platform, Newton physics engine.

2025.title: xAI releases Grok‑3 & Grok‑3 mini
2025.description: On February 17, xAI launched Grok‑3, a multimodal reasoning LLM outperforming GPT‑4o on math and science benchmarks, plus Grok‑3 mini and DeepSearch web-agent.

2025.title: Amazon forms agentic AI group for warehouse robotics
2025.description: In June 2025, Amazon’s Lab126 created a dedicated agentic AI team to equip warehouse robots with natural‑language comprehension and autonomous task execution.

2025.title: Microsoft Build 2025 highlights AI expansion
2025.description: At Build in May, Microsoft showcased new Copilot AI tools in Windows 11 & 365, autonomous agents, semantic search, developer tools, cancer treatment AI, Grok‑3.5 on Azure, and open‑sourced WSL.

2025.title: Google launches AI Mode in Search at I/O
2025.description: At Google I/O 2025, Sundar Pichai introduced AI Mode for Search—AI-generated overviews in results—called 'one of the most successful search launches in the last decade.'

2025.title: CES 2025 spotlights AI-powered robots & chips
2025.description: At CES (Jan 2025), X showcased advertising AI, while Segway, Siemens, Unitree revealed humanoid robots, drones, and Nvidia chips—highlighting AI’s role in robotics and consumer tech.

2025.title: Manus AI autonomous agent introduced
2025.description: In early 2025, Chinese startup Monica.im published a paper on Manus AI—an autonomous reasoning-to-action agent spanning healthcare, finance, manufacturing, robotics, and gaming.

2025.title: Sustainability research: Greening AI software engineering
2025.description: A June 2025 CECAM-Lorentz workshop released a research agenda on making AI systems energy-efficient, eco-friendly, and sustainability-aware through software engineering principles.
